sentences.en: ...the values society depends upon, such as honesty, sobriety and trust.
sentences.cn: ...社会所仰仗的那些价值观，如诚实、持重和信任。

sentences.en: An increase in sobriety would put thousands of bartenders out of business.
sentences.cn: 若更多人都变得清醒克制,无数酒吧间招待员将因此失业.

sentences.en: Buss was arrested after failing a field sobriety test.
sentences.cn: 没能通过大脑清醒测试的巴斯被拘捕.

sentences.en: But I once was such sobriety, such is clear I.
sentences.cn: 而我曾经是那么的清醒, 那么的清楚我自己.

sentences.en: Eventually those days of sobriety add up to years.
sentences.cn: 最终,这些天加起来就是几年了.

sentences.en: Genuinely enjoy the brief moment between drunkenness and sobriety.
sentences.cn: 酒醉与清醒间的一刻,也是最快乐的一刻.

sentences.en: Ginevan refused to take a field sobriety test and was arrested.
sentences.cn: 法庭纪录显示,吉纳凡拒绝接受现场酒测,因此被捕.

sentences.en: I insist on perfect sobriety and silence.
sentences.cn: 我坚决要求完全的肃静.

sentences.en: Jane's new sobriety surprised her friends.
sentences.cn: 简新的庄重态度使她的朋友们感到吃惊.

sentences.en: Jo had sudden fits of sobriety.
John had periods of sobriety, but always went back to drinking.
sentences.cn: 约翰也有清醒的时候，但总是重拾酗酒的老习惯。

sentences.en: The hundred knights were all men of choice behaviour and sobriety of manners.
sentences.cn: 那一百名武士都是品行端正,绝不胡作非为的.

sentences.en: The man denied drinking, but he failed the police test for sobriety.
sentences.cn: 人否认饮用, 但是他在警察测试不及格为清醒.

sentences.en: Through helping others, members reinforce their own sobriety and build up self - esteem .
sentences.cn: 通过帮助别人, 会员们加强了自我节制并逐步树立了 自尊心.

sentences.en: When women started working in offices, they opted for severity in dress in order to imply sobriety.
sentences.cn: 女性开始在办公室上班后，就会选择朴素而简洁的着装，以看上去持重冷静。

sentences.en: You had to get to Henry in those moments of sobriety.
sentences.cn: 你必须在亨利清醒的时刻同他打交道.

words.tran_cn: 使清醒的；使冷静的；严重的
